title: you will LOVE living on Iseminger!
description:
Situated on a quiet, sweet street in Washington Square West, 410 S Iseminger ticks all the boxes of trinity living. This two-bedroom, one-bathroom home features TWO outdoor spaces and has been beautifully updated for both modern comfort and historic preservation. Just through the front door, you’re greeted with a quaint living room with a well-maintained original fireplace and coat closet. Making your way downstairs, you’ll find the renovated kitchen with cellar door access to the street (for unloading groceries) and outdoor space. The kitchen has all new appliances, a new backsplash, and repointed exposed brick walls. The back patio is the perfect place to enjoy your morning coffee or work outside during a warm day. The first bedroom is found on the second floor of the home. Down the hall is the full bath featuring heated floors, a new toilet, and a new vanity. On the third floor of this trinity is the second bedroom with beautiful vaulted ceilings and exposed beams. Off of this bedroom is a little balcony. With two outdoor spaces, original hardwood floors, a basement for storage, central air, and close proximity to all your Center City favorites, you will LOVE living on Iseminger.

title: Make this New York-style loft in the heart of Logan Square !
description:
Make this New York-style loft in the heart of Logan Square with a 1-car deeded garage spot your new home! This great condo features high ceilings, original architectural details, exposed ducts and hardwood floors throughout. The home boasts an open concept-living area with exposed brick, oversized windows with Eastern exposure and exciting city skyline views, and is perfect for entertaining. The roomy kitchen provides generous counter space, modern cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops and a large island with ample seating space. The main level also includes two large bedrooms with lots of closet space, a full marble bath, a laundry closet with a full-size stacked washer/dryer and a coat closet. A custom metal staircase adorns the stairs leading to the main bedroom, complete with a large walk-in closet and en-suite bathroom featuring a spacious walk-in shower. 2200 Arch St also provides amazing amenities, including a 24-hour monitored entrance, concierge, on-site garage parking, fitness center, Arch Gourmet convenience store on the ground floor and it is pet friendly. The location is extremely convenient and walkable, just steps away from Trader Joe’s and GIANT stores, the Schuylkill River Trail, close to 30th Street Station, Rittenhouse and Logan Squares, many restaurants, cafes, shopping and the museums including The Franklin Institute and The Barnes. Easy access to I-76 and I-676 makes this location perfect for commuters and city dwellers alike. Disclaimer: Property is listed for sale and might be sold during the lease period. Tenants would have to agree to showings during their lease.
2200 Arch St #207

title: Renovated Studio Apartment Home with Wood Floors, Gym, Yoga Studio
description:
Apartment Home Features:
* Unfurnished studio apartment home at 1710 on 17th floor
* Renovated kitchen and bathroom
* Granite kitchen counters
* White kitchen cabinets
* Wood floors
* Large south-facing windows with Chancellor Street view
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Dishwasher
* Disposal
* All utilities, except cable and internet, are included
Community Amenities:
* 8,000-square-foot lounge with seating areas, pool table, conference room, kitchen, and dining area
* Fitness center with park view
* Yoga studio
* Sauna
* Dog spa
* Package lockers By Luxer One
* Guest suites
* High-rise building on Rittenhouse Square
* Laundry room on every floor and third floor laundry facility
* Elevator building with front door attendant and front desk concierge
* Online resident portal RentCafe for maintenance requests, rent payments, lease renewals, and more
* On-site maintenance
* Bicycle storage
* Attached valet parking garage! Parking spaces not managed by community, so the cost is separate.
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to retail stores, grocery stores, restaurants, and more! Retail stores on Rittenhouse Row include Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Glossier, Tselaine, Anthropologie, Lagos, Madewell, Tiffany & Co., Brooklinen, and Target. Go grocery shopping at Sue's Produce Market, Venditore by Giordano, Di Bruno Bros., Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, and Giant. Dine out at Pietro's, Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Via Locusta, Schlesinger's, Spice Finch, Bellini, La Fontana della Citta, a.kitchen, Zama, Restaurant Aleksandar, Villekebabs & Platters, Her Place, Wilder Restaurant, Tortorice's Specialty Sandwiches, Twenty Manning, Square on Square, Friday Saturday Sunday, and Trattoria Carina. Enjoy a churro sundae at El Merkury. Buy raisin nut bread from Metropolitan Bakery. View the collection at The Mütter Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday year-round. There is so much to do in this area!
Wondering if this home is still available? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 1710 is still listed under the Dali floor plan! Schedule an appointment to tour with Michelle or Gabby using ResMate, the chatbot concierge, at rittenhouseclaridge.com.
Check out our Facebook page for upcoming resident and local events!
Rittenhouse Claridge
Price is for the 22 month lease term. For an unfurnished home, 2 to 22 month lease terms are available! Price depends upon lease term and move-in date. Check out our website for current pricing!
Rental rates, availability, and apartment home features are subject to change without notice.
We can furnish a home for you over two weeks following rental application approval and after the home is made ready. Please note that there is a three-month lease term minimum for a furnished home. You would pay a furnished rent, which we will calculate for you.
Welcome home!

title: Sunny, Large 2 Bedroom in Old City!
description:
Sunny 2 bed/ 1 bath apartment in the heart of Old City. Five south facing widows in the main living space bring in beautiful light and overlook a large courtyard. Large main living space makes the apartment feel very spacious. The two bedrooms are on the back of the apartment and face the smaller street/alley way which means it is very quiet at night. Best of both worlds - city living and peaceful sleeping! Plus, green space!
Amazing closet space - around 10 feet of flat closet space in each bedroom. Large bathroom with washer and dryer.
Great neighbors - people are very friendly and we have made lots of friends here. But people will also respect if you want to keep to yourself. Great neighborhood - easy walk to restaurants on 2nd Street. Small grocery, pet store, UPS store, coffee shops, bakeries, hardware store, doggy daycare, ice cream shops, and restaurants all within a few blocks’ walk.
The maintenance team is incredible. They respond quickly and fix things very quickly. Our garbage disposal needed to be replaced and after they diagnosed the problem, they went to the store to get a new one and replaced it the next day.

title: Spacious and One of the Best Apartment Buildings in Philadelphia!!
description:
The Metropolitan apartments in Center City, Philadelphia stand tall in the center of Philadelphia's historic skyline. Designed by French architect Louis Jallade in the 1920s, this twin-tower apartment building showcases 26 stories of Art Deco elegance and has a prominent history as the former Philadelphia YMCA Armed Forces Building. Before being transformed into the Center City apartment building it is today, The Metropolitan was home to United States servicemen during World War II. Today, The Metropolitan is recognized as one of the best apartment buildings in Philadelphia. You will find a spacious studio, 1-, 2-and 3-bedroom apartment rentals. As well as amenities that include a lounge, gym, basketball court and a rooftop with a gorgeous view of the City Hall and Love Park. The Metropolitan apartments feature original limestone details, terra-cotta tiles, and hand-carved cornices. Fall in love with restored architectural details and contemporary amenities, including renovated kitchens with luxurious personal touches.
117 N 15th #1905
